item.description:
Science by the Pint goes viral! Well sorta. It's on the internet anyway.  Join us for another session of SBTP with Mike Farzan and colleagues discussing their work with viral infections and cells.  And of course there'll be the usual mingling with the scientists, and of course the Tavern's great food and beer selection.

Once again, the fun starts at 7:00, but we'll congregate at 6:30 to garner tables and order food in time for the lectures.  The event takes place in the back left corner of the main room by the bar (not the room all the way in the back on the right).

You can't miss Tavern in the Square - just get off the Red Line at Porter and head south on Mass Ave.  Park at your own peril, cause it's the Land of No Parking Signs With Convoluted Rules and Schedules (it's not impossible - I've found parking on Mass Ave, but the T is soooo close :)

Hope to see you there!

https://sitn.hms.harvard.edu/science-by-the-pint/

http://www.taverninthesquare.com/tavporter/
item.how_to_find_us: Look for us at the left rear corner of the main room across from the bar
item.name: Science by the Pint: Mike Farzan on Viral Infections and the Cell
